website_summaries.verdict: This thick and strong board was made to provide a superior performance, effortlessly glide over the water, and to easily manage your speed. A fine choice for skilled surfers who want even more control out of their ride.
pros: Designed for stability and a slick ride
cons: The Lancer is only available in one size: 5 feet 10 inches

customer_reviews.title: Good board. Use some glue in the fin screws!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice board. Our kids enjoy it and it nice for calmer waves due to its light weight and it doesn’t hurt much when you get hit in the head with it. My complaint is that one of the plastic screws you attach the fins with fell out what else we were using it for now not the second time. Good luck finding a replacement for that! You may want to add some water proof glue to yours when attaching!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good board for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good board. My 9 year old had no problems at all. I am 5’2 about 118, it was a bit more challenging for me to stand up... and I am very athletic. It was fun to practice on. If I was anything less than center, one side of the board went under... could just be my inexperience too. Absolutely a good purchase for a kid with some athletic ability.
customer_reviews.author: Penny B.

customer_reviews.title: Supper fun board for small days where a short board couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Supper fun board for small days where a short board couldn't cut it. Also a great board for beginners, for the price you cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Cool board.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fun board for the price. Perfect for the 5ft tall surfer who weighs 110 or less. My 14 yr old enjoys it for Atlantic coast surfing off the Carolinas. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chum

customer_reviews.title: Best board for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Board looks awesome. Love the twin fin retro look. Probably the main reason for buying this board for my kids. Board arrived with a couple small dings and one good size crease in the nose section, most likely from shipping company. Kids rode it non stop for 8hrs in Oceanside,CA. They are beginners and this board floats really well and it's very stable due to the width.
customer_reviews.author: sterling stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for the money. We bought this for our eight-year-old son who is just starting to surf. The size and volume is excellent and he was able to pop right up on the first day. Highly recommend if you are considering buying your child their first board
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A Kunsch

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Board
customer_reviews.text: THE PRICE POINT WAS GREAT AND WHEN IT ARRIVED IT WAS MUCH NICER THAN EXPECTED. THE KIDS ENJOYED LEARNING ON IT VERY MUCH AND IT IS VERY STABLE FOR THEM TO LEARN ON. VIBRANT COLORS AND EASY ASSEMBLY MAKES FOR A GREAT CHOICE. OUR KIDS FROM 5 TO 15 YEARS OF AGE TOOK TURNS SO IT LOOKS LIKE WE'LL BE ORDERING ANOTHER BOARD SOON...
customer_reviews.author: John J DeGirolamo

customer_reviews.title: Great Board !
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this ! Great beginner board for our 9 year old. Our 7 year old triplets are getting the hang of it too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our beginning surfers. Easy to handle. Kids got up right away. Only downside is there is no hand grip for easy carrying to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: JN Daly

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart but fun
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were not high for the price however after a month it delaminates. I rinse with fresh water after every use and it still didn’t hold up. I have had a wavestorm for a year and it has held up a lot better. That being said it’s been fun to surf and paddles well for an intermediate surfer weighing 160 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. A tad undersized for him though he said (5’11”” 170lbs). Good board.
customer_reviews.author: hal wilson

customer_reviews.title: Performance, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really good performance. Great Buoyancy, I'm 180 pounds. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this board. Four trips to the beach and this board as held up. Very durable and great for crowded beaches. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok for my kids. Did not hold my weight (190 lbs) well despite the 200 lb rating
customer_reviews.author: Hayward P.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool surfboard!
customer_reviews.text: Received the surfboard today! Super excited to get the kids out on the water!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Croston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quick shipping. Perfect for my daughter, 11yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Stevan Vale

customer_reviews.title: Real fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really great. Both of the boys could even stand a little bit in white wash after a few try’s.
customer_reviews.author: Canme

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, sturdy, perfect for my beginner 11-year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of weight! Great for beginners and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie Diassi

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Surfboard
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 year old son and it has been an amazing board for him to start on. It's light enough for him to carry, but strong enough that it can handle the water. This is a perfect beginner board and I don't have to worry about him getting hit with it when he wipes out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Michelle Wilkens

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners board
customer_reviews.text: So far happy with purchase and good board for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Keri B

product_meta.title: THURSO SURF Lancer 5'10'' Fish Soft Top Surfboard Package Includes Twin Fins Double Stainless Steel Swivel Leash EPS Core IXPE Deck HDPE Slick Bottom Built in Non Slip Deck Grip (Blue)
product_meta.description: THURSO SURF Lancer 5 ft 10 kids fish tail soft top surfboard package includes one surfboard + twin fins + 6' high-end double stainless steel swivels and triple rail saver ankle leash made with strong recycled plastic / Board sizes: 5'10" x 20" x 2.75" (155 cm x 51 cm x 7 cm) / Board volume 33.6 L/ Board weight: 6 lbs / Recommended max rider weight: 200 lbs The board is designed with a focus on stability and glide for easy riding with maximum enjoyment. High density EPS core makes the board very light and buoyant. The stiff and durable EPS core is the perfect core for hours of surfing fun HDPE slick bottom (heat laminated) is a strong and responsive bottom skin that adds stiffness and maximises board speed / High density durable IXPE deck (heat laminated) makes the board well cushioned and sealed to reduce risk of delamination Two wood stringers will provide greater longitudinal strength, rigidity and controlled flex / Two fins adds stability / Adjustable fin box makes the board good at changing performance and easy to transport Fish tail gives the board more hold and traction, provides more surface area from rail to rail, and allows for planning speed and lift. The board is popular among some high performance surfers in the nitro-small-wave hotdogger range
feature_bullets: THURSO SURF Lancer 5'10" kids fish tail soft top surfboard package includes one surfboard + twin fins + 6' high-end double stainless steel swivels and triple rail saver ankle leash made with strong recycled plastic / Board sizes: 5'10" x 20" x 2.75" (155 cm x 51 cm x 7 cm) / Board volume 33.6 Liter / Board weight: 6 lbs / Recommended max rider weight: 200 lbs

The board is designed with a focus on stability and glide for easy riding with maximum enjoyment. High density EPS core makes the board very light and buoyant. The stiff and durable EPS core is the perfect core for hours of surfing fun

HDPE slick bottom (heat laminated) is a strong and responsive bottom skin that adds stiffness and maximises board speed / High density durable IXPE deck (heat laminated) makes the board well cushioned and sealed to reduce risk of delamination

Two wood stringers will provide greater longitudinal strength, rigidity and controlled flex / Two fins adds stability / Adjustable fin box makes the board good at changing performance and easy to transport

Fish tail gives the board more hold and traction, provides more surface area from rail to rail, and allows for planning speed and lift. The board is popular among some high performance surfers in the nitro-small-wave hotdogger range

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
